mapper.select: select b.rnum,b.hospital_num,b.hospital_name,b.hospital_addr,b.hospital_phone from (select rownum as rnum , a.hospital_num,a.hospital_name,a.hospital_addr,a.hospital_phone from (select hospital_num,hospital_name,hospital_addr,hospital_phone from hospital order by hospital_num desc)a where rownum <= #{pageEnd})b where b.rnum >= #{pageBegin}
select hospital_num,hospital_name,hospital_addr,hospital_phone from hospital where hospital_name like '%' || #{hospital_name} || '%'
